additionalParams.summary: Finds the first occurrence of and returns the index.
additionalParams.exception: Thrown when .Length is 0, is outside bounds, is less than 1 or ( + ) exceeds bounds.
additionalParams.returns: The first index of , otherwise -1 if not found.
